name: University High School of Science and Engineering

warningBox.header: UHSSE and Stay Plugged In to Host Esports Recruiting Event October 15th & 16th
warningBox.info:
High School students will compete in person in front of College Recruiters looking to offer scholarships to prospective recruits.
Students will compete in Rocket League, Valorant, and SMASH Ultimate game titles.

This event will allow students who are interested in competing in esports at the collegiate level to play in front of and communicate with college coaches who are looking to add to their respective teams. Itâ€™s also an opportunity for students who may be interested in pursuing a career in esports to learn about the opportunities that exist.

REGISTRATION: FREE! High School players only, Middle School spectators encouraged to attend!  Registration starts at 8 AM both days.

Cost: 
Players Free
Students Free
Adult Spectators $5

lead: Early college high school located on the campus of University of Hartford
